front.title: Signaling MSD (Maximum SID Depth) using IS-IS

abstract.t: This document defines a way for an IS-IS Router to advertise multiple types of supported Maximum SID Depths (MSDs) at node and/or link granularity. Such advertisements allow entities (e.g., centralized controllers) to determine whether a particular SID stack can be supported in a given network. This document only defines one type of MSD maximum label imposition, but defines an encoding that can support other MSD types.
